title: Which associated with Piaget concrete operational

content.question: Which of the following behaviors is most clearly associated with Jean Piaget’s concrete operational stage?

choices.label: Sally thinks everyone’s favorite color is blue, because it is her favorite color.
Tom received the highest grade in his philosophy course.
Gracie forgets about her toy because it is under her blanket.
Nikos can consider both the height and width of a container.

content.answer: Nikos can consider both the height and width of a container.

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
